item.description: This will be an adventurous yet beautiful walk from Arlington Center up to the top of Peirce’s Hill (more commonly known as Arlington Heights). At the top of the hill is Robbins Farm Park, where we will get a spectacular view of the Boston skyline and the surrounding area. We will walk through some beautiful parks going up and on the way back take lit sidewalks on scenic side streets. Peirce’s Hill might not be the most famous of the hills in the area but be prepared for a long climb!
item.name: The Great Hill of Arlington
